title: Roman Gavryush
text:
Roman Igorevich Gavryush (; born 31 August 1983) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played 4 seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Chita">FC Chita</a>.
